poll.title: Title
poll.polls:
[{"creator":"0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","description":"Since the launch of the Starcoin autonomous network, more than 3,500 epochs have passed. As of block height 844799, UTC time 2021-07-06T09:19:01, a total of 3,519 epochs (currently 240 blocks per epoch). 

# Conclusion
The difficulty adjustment strategy of the consensus algorithm is in line with expectations, and the actual block generation time can be very close to the target time. 
The uncle block rate is relatively stable and the network is in good condition. 

But because the initial uncle block rate target is too large (240‰), the uncle block rate during this period has not reached the target, but the block generation speed has been adjusted to the minimum value of 5 seconds. Now it is decided to adjust the target of uncle block rate to 100‰ through on-chain configuration. 

# Impact
After the uncle block rate target is adjusted to 100‰, when the uncle block rate of a certain epoch exceeds 100‰, the block generation target time of the next epoch will automatically increase until the uncle block rate is less than 100 ‰. According to the above statistical results, the block generation time after adjustment will be greater than 5 seconds. 
Starcoin's block reward will be automatically adjusted according to the block time, so after the block time is greater than 5 seconds, the block reward will increase proportionally. However, due to the reduction of the uncle block rate target, the part of rewarding uncle blocks will be reduced, this part will be affected, and the speed of STC's PoW issuance will be slightly reduced. 

# Proposal information
Proposal id: 2
Initiating account: 0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a
Transaction 0xc126c0df93aa3ffbb6aac9f9fb35ac98e0525d883bcf5e2cd574c921111f325a
Change the value of the other configuration item 0x1::Conus_Config from the unchanged target 0x1::Conus_sensus to 100:Conus_Config.","id":2,"link":"https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/discussions/2675","status":4,"title":"[OnChainConfig]uncle rate target","for_votes":"0","against_votes":"0","end_time":"1626262357931","type_args_1":"0x1::OnChainConfigDao::OnChainConfigUpdate<0x1::ConsensusConfig::ConsensusConfig>"},{"creator":"0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","description":"With the growing demand for Move deployment in the Starcoin ecosystem, Starcoin plans to initiate a new proposal to officially open the Move contract. The proposal will start voting on June 23, 2021, and will end on June 30, 2021. It is proposed to fully open the deployment of Move contracts, allowing anyone to deploy Move contracts on the chain and build DeFi applications. The passage of this proposal will be a milestone moment, which means that the Starcoin ecosystem is completely open to embrace the DeFi ecosystem in an all-round way. This proposal is a voting proposal for the change of OnChainConfig. The configuration on the chain is changed through voting. 

# Proposal information
1. Original OnChainConfig


0x1::TransactionPublishOption::TransactionPublishOption{
 module_publishing_allowed: false,
 script_allowed: false,
} 


2. The changed OnChainConfig


0x1::TransactionPublishOption::TransactionPublishOption{
 module_publishing_allowed: true,
 script_allowed: true,
)


3. Proposal id: 1

4. Proposal transaction: https://explorer.starcoin.org/main/transactions/detail/0x299b901b998b54d46e71edda46663fc62d8168f5dea24c2dbd05a7813f42d889

5. Proposal initiating account: 0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","id":1,"link":"https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/discussions/2621","status":7,"title":"Starcoin Move publish open","for_votes":"7357180499200000","against_votes":"1000000000","end_time":"1625055256096","type_args_1":"0x1::OnChainConfigDao::OnChainConfigUpdate<0x1::TransactionPublishOption::TransactionPublishOption>"},{"creator":"0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a","description":"Voting for the Starcoin Move stdlib v5 upgrade is open. This upgrade is the first stdlib upgrade since the Starcoin mainnet lanuched and includes the following features.

- Add limit on treasury withdrawals proposol amount, the maximum amount of which cannot exceed the voted threshold (4% of the current liquidity). (#2566)
- Implemented a new on-chain authentication strategy to simplify the complexity of initializing on-chain accounts. (#2562)

## Upgrade proposal information
- Upgrade package binary: https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/tree/master/vm/stdlib/compiled/5/4-5
- Package hash: 0x20d79acaca9c50d4cbf51a992e5de658dcecf39c1573244f7d850b4b47af56d360
- Proposal id: 0
- Proposal transaction: https://explorer.starcoin.org/main/transactions/detail/0x0237dba2eb4ea5971f7fb53693acb91f6879bfa12db3c15f1a6281e1661d9ee0
- Proposer address: 0xb2aa52f94db4516c5beecef363af850a

Coin holders are invited to vote on the chain. When voting, the STC of the current account will be stake to the contract until the end of the voting period, which is currently 7 days. ** To encourage participation in on-chain governance, incentives for on-chain governance will be introduced in the future. Users who participate in voting this time will be compensated according to the incentive strategy. **","id":0,"link":"https://github.com/starcoinorg/starcoin/discussions/2578","status":7,"title":"Starcoin Move stdlib upgrade","for_votes":"7088587710402048","against_votes":"2000000000","end_time":"1623744459856","type_args_1":"0x1::UpgradeModuleDaoProposal::UpgradeModuleV2"}]

poll.minDateMsg: The end time must be at least 7 days later than the start time.
